original_text: And the time that David was king in Hebron over the house of Judah was seven years and six months.
korean_text: 다윗이 헤브론에서 유다 족속의 왕이 된 날 수는 칠 년 육 개월이더라

sentences.original_text: And the time that David was king in Hebron over the house of Judah
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 다윗이 헤브론에서 유다 집안의 왕이었던 때는

sentences.original_text: was seven years and six months.
